name: Plant Parenthood
description:
Planting Perfection

Somewhere between "Too Much" and not enough, you've got to give these plants the right conditions for thriving! Don't let them sit in the sun too long or they'll be toast! But also keep them watered to make sure they grow big and strong!

Move the plants in and out of the sunshine to make sure they don't overheat, but also get plenty of light. Keep them watered with the watering can too!

It's a fine balance and a tricky time when it comes to Plant Parenthood!
